manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description:
Plugin for deploying JRuby applications natively to servers based on the GlassFish Server 3 codebase, bypassing the Servlet container.

For more information:

  • GlassFish Community: http://www.glassfish.org
  • Oracle GlassFish Server and production support: http://www.oracle.com/goto/glassfish/index.html

Ruby support: editing, projects, Rails, etc. For information on recent changes, see http://wiki.netbeans.org/RubyRecentChanges.

For more information, see http://wiki.netbeans.org/Ruby.
